channel.title: add sub-forums for whonix-i2p
channel.description:
its better to add sub-forums for whonix-i2p issues:
* in "Support" section * in "Development" section
as if there is a problem inside whonix but inside whonix-i2p , it will be extreme confusing with usual whonix-Tor.
@mig5 @Patrick
